Text.Page:
, Nashwa has told me about your many successful missions.

The secret documents you recovered include a map marking the location of one of Kaidun's staff officer's bases. {@LinkCreature:32#21#Lotishara}'s strategies have sent many of the federation's soldiers to their deaths.

Go and show her the might of the Valkyon Federation.
Outstanding! The traitor's army has lost its right arm with Lotishara's death. The end of our battles is in sight.
